Maven Fluid Skin

Finally! A modern HTML5/CSS3 skin for Maven project site generation, based on the Foundation fluid layout framework. This skin allows for proper rendering on desktop computers, tablets and on mobile devices.

Your Maven project documentation never looked so good, with so little effort.

Getting started

Add the following skin configuration to your site.xml definition and you're ready to go.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project>
  <skin>
    <groupId>com.studiomediatech</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-fluid-skin</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  </skin>
  <body>
    ...
    <!-- Psst! Check out how the source code block scales and allows to scroll horizontally. This preserves code formatting in verbatim blocks. Yay! -->
  </body>
</project>

Getting paid

Well you know, it is all about getting the most out of your documentation. It is all about making it available - and with this skin you automatically get your information formatted for all types of devices.

You can even try out your documentation layout by simply resizing your browser window. This helps you determine what to document and how it will be made available to readers in different formats.
